column1: Little Goat Diner////Have been here for both breakfast and dinner.  Have to say it doesn't live up to the hype.  The food is not bad
column2: but its not worth the wait or the trip.  They try to either elevate typical diner food or put their own spin on comfort food from different cultures.  On paper the menu sounds great but for both breakfast and dinner the food turns out pretty average.  The place is usually packed but can't say that its justified
